textBeforeTable: Abbreviations Crochet Hook:Size K-10½ (6.50 mm) or size needed to obtain gauge. Yarn Needle Bulky Weight Yarn : White (CC) - 2 oz, 62 yd (55 g, 56 m) (Lion Brand Homespun - Deco) Materials: Super Bulky Weight Yarn : Pink (MC) - 5 oz, 81 yd (140 g, 74 m) (Lion Brand Hometown USA - New Orleans French Berry) Hat circumference = 17"-19" Head circumference = 21"-23½" Size: To fit Adult Women Easy Skill FP402 Pink and White Hat Dreamz wooden crochet hooks are Maggie's favorites - find out why: Click the banners below for more popular patterns, available via mail or download! textAfterTable: Special Stitches Front Post Double Crochet: (FPdc): Yo hook, insert hook from front to back to front around post of indicated st, yo hook, pull up lp, [yo hook, pull through 2 lps] twice. Unless noted otherwise, always skip the st behind the FPdc. HAT Rnd 1:(Right Side) With MC, ch 3; join with sl st to form ring; ch 3 (counts as first dc now and throughout), 11 dc in ring; join with sl st to first dc. (Join all dc-rnds in this manner) (12 dc) Rnd 2: Ch 3, dc in same dc as joining, [2 dc in next dc] around; join. (24 dc) Rnd 3:Ch 3, dc in same dc as joining, dc in next dc, [2 dc in next dc, dc in next dc] around; join. (36 dc) Rnds 4-9:Ch 3, [dc in next dc] around; join. (36 dc) At the end of Rnd 9, finish off and weave in ends. Rnd 10:With right side facing, join CC with sc to any dc, FPdc in corresponding dc 2 rows below (Row 8), * sc in next dc, FPdc in corresponding dc 2 rows below (Row 8), rep from * around; join with sl st to first sc. (36 sts) Rnd 11:Ch 1, sc in each st around; join with sl st to first sc. (36 sc) Finish off and weave in ends.
